description: In our experience here at MO30, we generally come across two kinds of Latin men. The first variety being overtly macho, and the second being much more quiet and unassuming. This week's Man Over 30 falls into that latter category.Leo is our ex-altar boy, who at 33 has always wanted to be in a video. His quiet demeanor just barely masks the bubbling sexuality that simmers under the surface of this tanned and toned hottie. We normally book our models well in advance, but with Leo we knew that the planets had aligned, and we had to shoot him right then and there or we might miss our chance!Starting out quite shy at first, barely giving us a peek of his snowy-white Calvin's, soon we hadhim naked and bending over to show us as fine and smooth a straight-guy ass as we've ever come across. It wasn't long before Leo was very into the camera, stroking, showing off, and crawling on the table. He even gave our prop voodoo stick a quick lick! When the big moment arrived, our ex-altar boy delivered a pop shot that made us believe in the power of prayer!
title: Snake Charmer, Scene #01
